titleTemplate.description: Title template pattern: Valid values - simple (default), objectTypeAndValue, tabbedPage. [Action] [Object Type] : [Object Name].TODO: implement trainPage

saveAndCreateAnotherShortDesc.description: Defines save and continue short description

saveAndCloseShortDesc.description: Defines save and close short description

cancelRendered.description: Defines whether cancel button is Rendered

saveRendered.description: Defines whether save button is Rendered

saveAndCreateAnotherRendered.description: Defines whether save and continue button is Rendered

saveAndCloseRendered.description: Defines whether save and close button is Rendered

submitRendered.description: Defines whether submit button is Rendered

editRendered.description: Defines whether edit button is Rendered

doneRendered.description: Defines whether done button is Rendered

cancelDisabled.description: Defines whether cancel button is Disabled

saveDisabled.description: Defines whether save button is Disabled

editDisabled.description: Defines whether edit button is Disabled

saveAndCreateAnotherDisabled.description: Defines whether save button is Disabled

saveAndCloseDisabled.description: Defines whether save button is Disabled

submitDisabled.description: Defines whether submit button is Disabled

doneDisabled.description: Defines whether done button is Disabled

primarySave.description: Defines whether save buttons should be side by side or drop button. In case of drop button, this attribute takes the value of the primary action [save] or [saveAndClose]

submitStyle.description: Defines whether submit will have drop buttons rendered: [dropButton]. TODO

submitText.description: Defines text to display in Submit button

submitAccessKey.description: Defines access key for submit button

stickyHeaderEnabled.description: Defines whether simple panel will stick to the browser chrome

saveAction.description: Click Action for the Save Button

submitAction.description: Click Action for the Submit Button

editAction.description: Click Action for the Edit Button

saveAndCloseAction.description: Click Action for the Save and Close Button

detailPage.description: Use this if your page is a detail page. Helpful for mobile view.
